title: SOZULAMP 3 Way Light Switch with Night Light-Easy to Install-No Neutral Required,Illuminated Three Way Switch with Light Sensor,15 Amp 110V,Residential Grade(2Pack,Dayligh LED)

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: #68,868 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)   #232 in Electrical Light Switches

shipping_info: FREE Wednesday, June 11 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

feature_bullets: Ideal Lighting ：The soft lighting will not disturb sleep, and light a pathway to where you are going.
Child Safety ：Preventing kids from being get shocked and cut by bulky plug-in nightlights.
Perfect Addition ：Night lights can also be used in areas where there are only switches.
Easy Installation ：Shallow body design fits most junction boxes;push-in and side wire.
High Quality ： High quality materials combined with strict testing create durable products.
【Smart Illumination】 --Built-in dusk to dawn sensor，automatically turn on/off LED.
【Standard Light Switch】 --15 Amp 120-277VAC,single pole light switch.
【Widely Applicable】 -- Ideal for kitchen, bedroom, bathroom, hallway, stairs, and anywhere you need.

customers_say: Customers like the light switch's brightness, particularly how it works in dark hallways and serves as a night light, and appreciate its easy installation and nice appearance. The functionality receives mixed feedback - while some say it works well, others report that it stops working. Moreover, the quality and value for money also get mixed reviews, with some describing it as cheaply made and not worth the money, while others consider it a great value.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I have bought these switches and the brand several times and am very impressed.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2025

customer_reviews.review_title: 4.0 out of 5 starsLight is very bright, switch is loud when flipped
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: These switches have worked well since installing them several months ago however they are pretty noisy and sometimes difficult to switch as they seem to want to stay in the on or off position. Flipping one of these switches in a room where someone is sleeping will most definitely wake them up if they are a light sleeper.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2025

customer_reviews.rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars5.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: These are nice in a dark hallway in our vacation home. They’re easy to spot in otherwise very dark hallway. They’re actually a little bit brighter than the photo shows but when I take the photo with the iPhone night mode, they come out looking way too bright.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
customer_reviews.review_snippet: We have a ranch style house with long center hallway between the two ends. In the hallway there are two sets of 3-way switches which are probably 40 years old and were begging to be replaced. Each had a tiny orange glowing light in the paddles that would illuminate when they were off. All it would do at night is let you know where the light switch was. The hallway itself was still pitch dark and so we'd still need to turn a light on to see our way.These new switches are exactly what was needed to update/upgrade the old switches. The amount of light given off when at night is wonderful - perfect to provide enough light in the hallway without turning on the lights.During the day, there isn't much light getting to a couple of the switches and so they remain on all day as well. That's fine as the power consumption is pretty insignificant.Very happy with these switches at this point. Hopefully they will last.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Works great. Bought many items and products.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: These are easy to replace. I used them on my hallway. The led lights come on when the hallway darkens. Works well for seeing at night.
